name: The Deepest Space
description:
Made during Ludum Dare 48 (The Compo)

Controls:

Hold Space - engine thrust

Left Arrow and Right Arrow - rotate ship

M - toggle map on/off

N - toggle navigation on/off

Minus (-) - Zoom out

Plus (+) - Zoom In

How to play:

You should reach the anomaly at the deep space beyond Neptune's orbit. There is white mark on navigation that can lead you. Also, there is white dot on map.

Use the gravity of planets and collect the fuel containers (green boxes) to restore fuel.

If you full tank become empty, you will die.

If you crash into planet, you will die.

Reach the Anomaly and lead Humanity to the Deepest Space!
